name: Checkout Champ
author: Checkout Champ

sections.description:
Checkout Champ makes WooCommerce even better

Looking for ways to boost sales on your WooCommerce store, look no further than Checkout Champ. This all-in-one e-commerce platform increases sales and improves your bottom line.

Branded store owners choose WooCommerce platform for increased flexibility and control over the whole website experience including blogging and customer service.

That power and customization goes even deeper when you add Checkout Champ to WooCommerce and see the results – other users have experienced up to 10x Page Speed, 2-3x Conversions Out Of The Box, A $40-$50 AOV Bump, and A Better Experience For Your Customers.

Even before you change any offers or copy.

Why do WooCommerce Users love Checkout Champ?

Checkout Champ adds these powerful features to your Woocommerce store – all wrapped up in a fast high-performance integrated system:

  • Eliminate and replace slow-loading, low-converting checkout pages with beautiful, totally customized, lightning-fast checkout pages that load in under 1 second.

  • Total customization and control of the checkout page experience to make the ‘moment of truth’ a smooth and simple process for customers.

  • Optimize revenue by boosting average order value by $40+ and 2-3X your conversions with Custom One-Click-Upsells that increase AOV, while still being fully PCI compliant

  • Go international with over 180 payment gateways and native support for 100+ currencies.

  • Boost customer lifetime value with the easiest and most versatile programmable subscription billing system in the industry. Your customer will be notified when the product they are about to buy is available on a subscription deal.

  • Create unlimited high-converting sales pages and upsell funnels for any combination of SKUs with Checkout Champ’s powerful drag and drop landing page and funnel builder.

  • Recover more Abandoned Carts with advanced ‘partial’ data as Checkout Champ captures every keystroke even if the customer bounces off page before clicking the ‘Buy’ button.

  • Streamline all business processes in one hub. Access all your data and KPIs in ONE powerful central dashboard with ONE login.

  • Advanced reporting and analytical suite. Track web traffic, affiliates, transactions, chargebacks, fraudulent charges, sales, upsells, subscriptions, memberships, AOV, and CLTV on all your stores and sales pages.

  • Create a fully functional membership portal in just one click and replace your native member’s area within 5-10 minutes.

  • Your very own dedicated Client Success Manager who provides round-the-clock support – from CRM migration, to onboarding, to making sure all your customer information is transferred to Checkout Champ without a hitch, and ongoing optimisation support too.

  • 4-way A/B/C/D split testing options at every step of the funnel to optimise 4x faster than standard A/B testing.

  • Over 500 partner integrations to help you run your business smoothly and efficiently.

  • Save money while you scale as Checkout Champ eliminates the need to pay for 4-5 different apps that slow down your site. You can now channel your budget to other revenue-boosting activities.

  • Automates customer fulfillment by sending orders directly to fulfillment companies like ShipStation, ShipBob, ShippingEasy, and more.

  • Easily sync all products, variations, and price points with a click of a button.

  • Checkout Champ\’s Fraud Manager pre-identifies and prevents fraudulent transactions from happening.

  • Chargeback Management integrations help store owners to get ahead of chargebacks and remove a huge risk factor from their business.

  • If you’re an agency there’s no need to worry. Checkout Champ can handle THOUSANDS of stores all from one easy-to-use dashboard.

  • 24/7 support: Get help when you need it, 24 hours a day, seven days a week. We are ALWAYS here for you.

Book A Demo Now And Watch Your Sales Grow

To see Checkout Champ in action and get the full picture of what it can do for your business – book a demonstration with our Client Success team

Checkout Champ Official Website
sections.installation:
1. Upload checkoutchamp.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the \\’Plugins\\’ menu in WordPress
